channel.title: Shops Issue: unpackedShops.txt
channel.description:
Hi, whenever I try to add items into one NPC shop (ID = 19) it doesn't add them all it will only add 1 item.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/op47qe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2808aa1.png[/img]
Can someone tell me what i'm doing wrong? Source=667.

item.title: Shops Issue: unpackedShops.txt
item.dc:creator: @Danny_Roggia Danny Roggia
item.description:
@Danny_Roggia wrote:

Yes

I have an error…

[ShopsHandler] Packing shops... ERROR! THREAD NAME: main java.lang.RunTimeException: Invalid list for shop line: at com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler.loadUnpackedShops(ShopsHandler.java:48) at com.rs.utils.ShopsHandler.init(ShopsHandler.java:30_ at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:78)

BUT it worked. But how do i fix this error?

I am SO confused. The Error/problem has just… Gone away…

I guess I won’t worry about this issue anymore… Thread is done… O.o

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Issue: unpackedShops.txt
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

are you deleting the packed shops every time before you compile and run the server?

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Issue: unpackedShops.txt
item.dc:creator: @Danny_Roggia Danny Roggia
item.description:
@Danny_Roggia wrote:

I’ve tried that, and it still did not work.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Issue: unpackedShops.txt
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I think each line is meant to be for a different shop. After 1155 1000 add 1117 1000 and so on.
do it like that itemid amt itemid amt

You don’t need to do the same shop every time.

Read full topic
